channel.title: Blogging on GeekyHub
channel.description: Recent content in Blogging on GeekyHub

item.title: Setting up my new blog
item.description: I had my last paper of this semester’s exams just a day before yesterday. If I can speak my mind, this semester has been very boring. Most of the subjects were a just compilation of the subjects I have read in previous semesters which made me lukewarm about studies. I am just hopeful that I’ll get pass marks in all subject. In course of examination, I stumbled upon my lost forgotten blog on Blogger .
